p: All crude extracts of N. cataria, ethanol, petroleum ether, and chloroform extracts revealed significant amelioration in blood glucose and insulin levels, and an improvement in hepatocytes and pancreas β-cells, for diabetic rats. The hypoglycemic action of the extract was explained by the presence of antioxidants such as flavonoids and polyphenols, which may prevent the progressive impairment of pancreatic β-cell function, and may improve all carbohydrate brush border hydrolyzing enzymes [ 135].
